title: A Refugee Family’s First Days - The New York Times

organizations.name: new york times site mobile navigation a refugee family

text:
Site Mobile Navigation A Refugee Family’s First Days This is the true story of a Syrian family’s journey to America. We plan to follow their lives over the coming months. FEB. 4, 2017 
This is the second installment of “Welcome to the New World,” a series that will follow this family’s first months in America and appear regularly in Sunday Review. Read the first installment here. 
Jake Halpern is the author, most recently, of “Bad Paper: Inside the Secret World of Debt Collectors.” Michael Sloan is an illustrator and artist. “Welcome to the New World” will follow this family’s first months in America and appear regularly in Sunday Review. Designed and produced by Grant Gold More on NYTimes.com
